name: Nyctos
description:
Waking up to your house turned into a mess, the only way to leave this nightmare is to solve puzzles in order to revert your house to minimalist decor.

The game is played with the keyboard (WASD keys) and mouse (move to look around, left mouse button to interact with objects). Escape (Esc) key for the pause menu.

The puzzles were meant to continue in the ground floor, so we left it open for the player to walk around and explore as a hint of what awaits in a future update.
